original_text: After three days he called together the local leaders of the Jews, and when they had gathered, he said to them, “Brothers, though I had done nothing against our people or the customs of our fathers, yet I was delivered as a prisoner from Jerusalem into the hands of the Romans.
korean_text: 사흘 후에 바울이 유대인 중 높은 사람들을 청하여 그들이 모인 후에 이르되 여러분 형제들아 내가 이스라엘 백성이나 우리 조상의 관습을 배척한 일이 없는데 예루살렘에서 로마인의 손에 죄수로 내준 바 되었으니

sentences.original_text: After three days he called together the local leaders of the Jews
sentences.korean_translation: 사흘 후에 그는 유대인 지도자들을 모았고

sentences.original_text: and when they had gathered, he said to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 모였을 때 그는 그들에게 말했다

sentences.original_text: though I had done nothing against our people
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 우리 백성을 거스르는 아무 일도 하지 않았지만

sentences.original_text: or the customs of our fathers,
yet I was delivered as a prisoner from Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그럼에도 불구하고 나는 예루살렘에서 죄수로 넘겨져

sentences.original_text: into the hands of the Romans.
